rsda is a design archive with a special focus on nineteenth century Portuguese graphic design and illustration. The archive currently contains 20 artifacts. Maintained by Ricardo Santos.

All materials created by rsda are shared under a CC Attribution-Share Alike license. Artworks and other resources are shared for educational and research purposes.
